pilots.name: Binayre Pirate
pilots.text: Operating from the Double Worlds, Talus and Tralus, Kath Scarlet's gang of smugglers and pirates would never be described as reputable or dependableâ€”even by other criminals.

pilots.name: Black Sun Soldier
pilots.text: The vast and ??? Black Sun crime syndicate can always find a use for talented pilots provided they aren't particular about how they earn their credits.

pilots.name: Kaa'to Leeachos
pilots.caption: Imposing Marauder
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

pilots.name: N'Dru Suhlak
pilots.caption: Merc Saboteur
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, roll 1 additional attack dice.
